title: I cant play LOL
body:
Hi there,

I am not sure what is actually happening but I can't play league of legend since it won't connect me to be in the game. I am able to log in and join the cue however once the game actually begins I can't connect or reconnect to the game. Then it says 'cannot connect to the server and this could be temporary network problem. Would you like to retry to connect to the server?'. I've lost my last rank game since I couldn't connect and its there as I left the game. I had no problem playing leagues until this moment so I tried again with normal game this time. Nek minute.. It's happening again! Is this only me and my computer or others experiencing the same thing? I don't expect you to cover my lost game however I would love you to answer and so I can play some leagues again! Thank you!

replies.body: Around about 10~11. I had no problem playing lol last few years!

Ok, so it couldn't be because of lag then.

Try re-allowing League through your firewall again. Then, if that doesn't work, try setting your DNS to Google's Public DNS. If you need help with that, just ask.

Best of luck.
